thread.title: Carl T.
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by Carl T.

author: Carl T.
title: Carl T.
text: I had a satisfactory experience in purchasing a nightstand (Kincaid Cherry Park) at Grand Home Furnishings a few days ago (in late January of 2017). The salesperson's helpfulness, my overall shopping experience in the store (located near the Valley View Mall), and the store's arrangement for me to pick up the nightstand (two days after I made the purchase) were all very good.
